articles.title: Judge in Kyle Rittenhouse trial makes inappropriate Asian food joke - CTV News
articles.description: The judge presiding over the homicide trial of Kyle Rittenhouse confused observers after making a strange and off-color joke inside the courtroom on Thursday.
articles.content:

articles.description: Pacific leaders, hosted entirely online by New Zealand, agree to chart a road to post-pandemic recovery to ensure the Asia-Pacific region "remains the world’s most dynamic and interconnected regional economy".
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) leaders have promised to make COVID-19 vaccines more accessible and reduce dependence on fossil fuels to tackle climate change.
